Package de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids

Class FluidMesh

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.world.fluids.FluidMesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
Renderable
public class FluidMesh
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
A class that can be used to create a mesh for an ActiveFluid. It creates the mesh depending on the height percentage of each ActiveFluidBlock, which is fetched by calling its getModelHeightPercentage method. It shares similar functions with the BlockArrayMesh and a common abstract mesh class should be created in the future.
Author:
Tobias Mueller

    • addTextureCoordinates

      private void addTextureCoordinates​(int textureIndex, boolean mirror, int vertexOffset)
      Adds the right texture from the texture atlas to the block
      Parameters:
      blockID - the id of the block
      textureIndex - indicates which side of the cube is needed. (0 == front, 1 == right, 2 == back, 3 == left, 4 == top, 5 == bottom)
